name: VentilatorDevice
title: Ventilator Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Ventilator devices.),(Data Element Scope: Ventilator devices approved for patient use by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Ventilator devices.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Home ventilator, any type, used with invasive interface, (e.g., tracheostomy tube)
Home ventilator, any type, used with non-invasive interface, (e.g., mask, chest shell)

Home ventilator, multi-function respiratory device, also performs any or all of the additional functions of oxygen concentration, drug nebulization, aspiration, and cough stimulation, includes all accessories, components and supplies for all functions
